column4: hey.  i do not use a bottem gnome panel, or screenlets.  is there a way to shortcut to my trash?
right click choose trash?
you can have it bypass trash and delete if you want.

ah to open trash I see>
yes
I don't use trash I delete, and missread your post, mybad.
how can i bypass the trash?
open nautilus edit then preferences tehn behaviour
you can switch to a single click there as well.
wow
how about underlining the names of files and folders?
not sure there.
thank you so much
no problem, first thing I do is bypass the trash and set single click on every set up I can.

be careful about asking questions here in lieu of problems as a new user or ever the answers you get may be biased or just wrong.
